author: Justin Soderberg
title: Hockey East Predictions: Week #1
text:
Tweet on Twitter 
Introducing a brand new segment on MillCitySports.com , Hockey East weekly predictions! 
This year I will be making my predictions along with Mike McMahon of College Hockey News and The Mack Report ; Joshua Kummins of SB Nation and New England Hockey Journal ; Shawn Hutcheon of the Lowell Sun ; and Greg Celona of Mill City Sports . 
We will pick the winner of every regular season game and playoff game this year that features at least one Hockey East school. Beginning with opening weekend. 
Throughout the year we will keep track of the winners and losers and will crown a winner at the end of the season for the best overall record. Although no prize is up for grabs, peoples pride is at stake! Enjoy! FRIDAY, OCTOBER 9
